alert.note: Alert for Dent; Maries; Miller; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 02 at 9:55AM CDT until August 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IS CANCELLED... The Flood Watch is cancelled for portions of central, east central, and south central Missouri, including the following areas, in central Missouri, Maries, Miller and Pulaski. In east central Missouri, Phelps. In south central Missouri, Dent. Flooding is no longer expected to pose a threat. Please continue to heed remaining road closures. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, and south central Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Maries, Miller and Pulaski. In east central Missouri, Phelps. In south central Missouri, Dent. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The initial watch for this morning has been cancelled. Additional thunderstorm development is expected tonight with the chance for flooding. Thus the reason for the 2nd watch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
